direction.raw_text: Caption: Bethlehem Creek, Wyoming 10:19pm 28/07/47 The air is filled with the sounds of a warm, summer night. A light comes on in a FARMHOUSE window. The door opens, a small dog and a young girl emerge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go on now Paul, don't be long. The dog trots out across the property. It stops to scratch. The sounds of night cease. The dog stops scratching, sniffing the air, cocking its head, sensing something. We hear a low humming sounds. The dog looks up. We see a soft orange glow reflected in its eyes. The dog whimpers Back at the farmhouse, a deep, dull thud shakes the ground, bringing the small girl back out onto the veranda. An orange glow pulsates somewhere out in the darkness.

direction.raw_text: Paul... Paul? The girl draws near, illuminated by the orange glow.

direction.raw_text: EXT. SAN DIEGO STREET. PRESENT - DAY GRAHAM WILLY (32) and CLIVE GOLLINGS (33) stand in the blazing San Diego sunshine, waiting to cross the road. GRAHAM is thin but his clothes seem too small. He has long greasy hair, buck teeth and thick glasses. CLIVE is bigger and wears a long black leather coat, Red Dwarf T-shirt and boots. His hair is densely curly and shaped like a pyramid. Four people dressed as BORG from Star Trek pass by. GRAHAM and CLIVE shrug derisively. The cross-walk beeps. As the music kicks in, GRAHAM and CLIVE set off across the road towards the San Diego Convention Centre. They make their way through a throng of costumed Comic-Con attendees.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: opens the trunk of his car. He pulls out a large piston, spare ammo and a webbing pack which he slings around his shoulder. He sets off up the hill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CLEARING - NIGHT TEAM PAUL are walking round the tower. As they round the corner the landscape changes, the trees give way to a piece of open pasture flanked by pine forest, the tower opens itself up slightly, a perfect natural amphitheatre.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: takes out the firework, Zippo and cigarettes from his back pack. He lights his last cigarette and takes a drag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll miss these.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: takes the firework a little way off and sticks it in the ground. He crouches down and lights the touch paper with the cigarette, then scampers back to the gang. Beat. The firework rises into the sky. It explodes. The star-burst is massive and bright red, it illuminates the tower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We wait. A light appears in the sky some way off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (FROWNING) That was quick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FOREST - NIGHT ZOIL runs through the bush, fast, like a wild animal. His face fixed with serious intent, gun in one hand, torch in the other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CLEARING - NIGHT TEAM PAUL watch as the ethereal light draws nearer. Spotlights cut through the night, searching beneath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FOREST - NIGHT ZOIL leaps a fallen tree. Ahead, through the trees, he sees an ethereal glow. He pulls the slide back on his pistol.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CLEARING - NIGHT The lights are really close now. They are accompanied by a deep rumble. A very earthly sound. Rotor blades.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait a minute...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: swoops in to land, kicking dust and debris into the air. TEAM PAUL turn back to the woods but are stopped by the sight of a torch getting nearer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh shit. Behind them, the HELICOPTER powers down. The door opens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, whaddya know? Small world.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: appears flanked by two faceless, heavily armed
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . They level their weapons, just as ZOIL bursts through the trees behind them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lorenzo?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: spins round. We go into slow motion. ZOIL fires. The bullet explodes from the gun, straight at us. Angle on the bullet as it passes in ECU. The shot moves round behind the bullet to reveal PAUL, looking shocked. The bullet whizzes past him, slamming into one of the soldiers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rolls, coming to rest on one knee. He fires a second shot into the leg of the other soldier who collapses. He leaves his gun at VOICE just as the PILOT bursts from the cockpit. The PILOT fires but misses ZOIL. ZOIL takes out his shoulder, spinning him off his feet. VOICE steps forward, holding a smoking gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was you! You told him. I should've known. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've never made a mistake in your life. That's why I put you in charge of this fucking mission.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's my friend! I've known him for twenty years. He introduced me to my wife damnit!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You stupid son of a bitch. In five years, you could have been where I am.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to be where you are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too bad, seeing as I'm the one hold'ng all the cards and when I say "cards", I of course mean big fucking gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: points his gun at PAUL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How'd you find me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was pretty easy once we got a fix on the geek-mobile. Wasn't hard to figure out where you were headed. You always did have a flare for the dramatic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: nods, a sad smile creeping across his mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stands in front of PAUL, then RUTH, then GRAHAM then
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: who summons every ounce of bravery in his body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's not going anywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be honest with yourself, two scoops. What is it that you think you can possibly bring to the table at this stage in the game?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: reaches beyond his back and produces his KATANA SWORD, he holds it like a proud Samurai.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blind fury. The blade falls off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bloody low grade Turkish alloy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Step aside, you fat nerd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Graham, his this man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: steps aside. GRAHAM slams his fist into the face of the unsuspecting VOICE. He staggers back but rallies quickly, blocking GRAHAM's second blow and delivering a heavy rebuke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: leaps onto VOICE's back and starts pummeling his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave him alone!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: hits out at RUTH. GRAHAM renews his attack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave her alone!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: throws them off and comes face to face with TARA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave them alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! She whacks VOICE across the face with a large stick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not taking him away again. He staggers backwards and falls to the ground, unconscious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Tara.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't mention it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rushes to ZOIL who lies on the ground, wounded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The things I do for you, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know I appreciate it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have any idea how difficult it was to catch you guys?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me take a look at that. Ruth, shine the torch down here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: grabs a torch and steps in behind PAUL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! RUTH lurches forward, suddenly limp. Everyone turns to see MOSES BEHE, shotgun smoking in his and. His face white, his eyes wide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh Lord, Ruth. My little Ruth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Noooooooooo!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: gathers RUTH up in his arms. She coughs, flecks of blood around her mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I never meant to shoot her. I was aiming for the goblin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's not a goblin he's from another planet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But he can't be. He... he...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's an alien you stupid man! Oh Ruth, Ruth I'm sorry, I'm so sorry. I should have never persuaded you to come with us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: focuses on GRAHAM. She smiles, weakly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What, and miss all this? Graham, I've lived more in the last 48 hours that I ever did in that trailer park. Isn't that what you said living was all about? Right now? This conversation? That tree? My next cheeseburger? I'm not afraid anymore Graham. I'm cold though. Hey, where is everybody?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: shudders and dies. TARA and ZOIL look aghast. GRAHAM buries his head in RUTH's hair. CLIVE, his eyes are filled with tears, puts his and on GRAHAM's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What have I done? I'm sorry. I'm so sorry. A shadow is cast across RUTH. Everyone looks up to see PAUL, silhouetted against the moon. His eyes glint.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is no way this thing isn't gonna end happy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: drops to his knee and places his hands on RUTH's chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: drops his shotgun and lumbers over, distraught.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get away from her! Don't you touch my little girl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: holds out a hand to stop MOSES. He obeys. The air hums, charged with static. PAUL's skin ripples with color. Everyone watches transfixed. RUTH's eye flickers and opens. With some difficulty, she sits up and takes off her glasses. She blinks both shining, healthy eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ruth, are you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think so. Is anyone hungry? I really feel like a cheese burger. Relief and joy spreads through group. MOSES falls to his knees and sobs. He feels a hand on his shoulder and looks up to see PAUL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and GRAHAM hug. She smiles at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can kiss me now. They kiss with awkward passion. Everyone smiles then after a bit become uncomfortable and a bit grossed out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like the geek shall inherit the earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The group turn to see VOICE, upright, pointing his gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't say-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A large spaceship lands hard on top of VOICE. Everyone looks shocked. PAUL, GRAHAM and CLIVE exchange a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Happens to the best of us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CLEARING - NIGHT Some time has passed, a number of PAUL style aliens are now present.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . One of them uses a big hose to clean the remains of VOICE from the hull of the ship. Another two help the now healed soldier to their feet, patting them on the back and shaking their hands. The atmosphere is amiable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: look at one another. ZOIL and MOSES have joined them. PAUL kisses and hugs RUTH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry I frightened you so much your hair turned white.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You didn't frighten me. You freed me. You helped me see the light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take care of her big man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will sir. God be with you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever dude. They high five. PAUL turns to ZOIL, whose arm is in a makeshift sling and shakes his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lorenzo Zoil, you're a good man. Say bye to Karen for me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Safe trip Short Round.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: turns to GRAHAM and CLIVE. He pulls JELVA - ALIEN QUEEN OF THE VARVAK from his pocket and hands it to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can keep it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cool. Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you think?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Three tits, awesome. Although you know what? Sometimes, less is more. The boys nod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are, and always will be, our friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come here you fucking geeks. They hug. He takes in incandescent orb from his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a self-sustaining light orb. Might come in handy, you know, if a bulb goes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is waiting for her goodbye but PAUL ignores her. He face drops as he walks to his ship. He turns to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You coming?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I ruined your life Tara. Think I owe you a new one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: takes PAUL's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have my toothbrush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Baby, where we're going, you won't need teeth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: frowns then follows PAUL aboard. PAUL and TARA stand in the doorway. One of the other ALIENS comes out of a small room behind them, speaking in a strange tongue. Subtitle: THE BULB'S GONE IN THERE. As the door slowly closes, GRAHAM and CLIVE give PAUL the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: salute. PAUL gives them the finger. The boys laugh, tears in their eyes. The ship lifts off into the sky. GRAHAM, CLIVE, RUTH, MOSES and ZOIL watch them go. The light form the ship gradually fades, leaving them in darkness. Pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was good, wasn't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SIGNING PAVILLION - DAY We are at Comic-Con the following year. We come to rest on a long line of people. Sat behind a table are GRAHAM and CLIVE. They look more confident, cooler. CLIVE is talking to a short woman in an EWOK costume. He pats her on the ass as she walks away. All around them are stacks of their new novel: PAUL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A banner hangs behind, displaying the cover, GRAHAM's own rendering of their alien friend. They sign copies. The
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: mills around, looking very pleased.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just one item per person please. He winks at the boys. RUTH rushes up to GRAHAM, she is dressed as Storm from X-Men and pushes a customized buggy, in which sits a baby dressed as Professor X.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey babe. You okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm just taking Tara over to the autograph pavilion. Michael Biehn's here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, say hi from us, won't you?
direction.name: direction
